sources.title: Hobby Horse-Laffs (1942)
sources.description: Hobby Horse-Laffs is a 1942 Looney Tunes short movie directed by U.S. Corporal Norman McCabe and released to movie theaters by RKO Radio Pictures. It stars Mel Blanc. Watch on RetroFlix.org:Â  https://retroflix.org/hobby-horse-laffs-1942/

metadata.Plot: A spoof of a popular radio program of the time called "Hobby Lobby", with blackout gags showcasing people's various hobbies and inventions.
metadata.Actors: Kent Rogers, Mel Blanc, Robert C. Bruce
